title: Unemployment and money: the principles involved
brief_description: A description and discussion of the principles which cause a recurrence of unemployment. Describes in detail the circulation of money and the place of banks in the monetary system.
description: A description and discussion of the principles which cause a recurrence of unemployment. Describes in detail the circulation of money and the place of banks in the monetary system.
